page.title: 05A MORNINGS WORK
page.content: Colin & Mandy own & run a small Inn in Ballater. They live outside the village;where they grow a wide range of fresh food. "Day starts 6.30ish,children run down to play, Colin gets ready for work. Can't linger in bed, hens to feed, lettuces & herbs to pick, beds to make...Too soon its 9.20 - drive our bumpy track then 3+miles to Ballater. Rory,5, dropped at playgroup(as treasurer there may be fees to collect)- off to Inn with Jamie,2; deliver vegetables,do some gardening. Quick cup of coffee, collect Rory & go home. Dog demands dinner, busy hour of getting lunch,tidying up. Rory collects eggs from our 9 hens. Colin returns on motorbike at 2.30, reports busy time at Inn. Typical lunch: home made soup, grilled rainbow trout, home made apple pie. 2 hours gardening."
